headline: Trump Might Limit Defense-Stock Dividends. That’s a Bad Idea.
summary: President Donald Trump is playing Santa Claus.  The president is considering an executive order that would limit defense companies’ ability to pay dividends or buy back stock if projects are behind schedule or over budget, according to a report from Reuters.  The White House didn’t immediately respond to a request for comment.

raw.headline: Trump Might Limit Defense-Stock Dividends. That’s a Bad Idea.

headline: Hexcel Corporation (HXL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Hexcel Corporation on Valueinvestorsclub.com by ElCid. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on HXL. Hexcel Corporation’s share was trading at $72.66 as of December 17th. HXL’s trailing and forward P/E were 85.07 and 28.82 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Singapore Airshow 2026 Marks 10th Edition with New Frontiers in Aviation and Space
summary: Singapore Airshow, one of the most inﬂuential international aerospace and defence exhibition, will return from 3 - 8 February 2026 at the Changi Exhibition Centre. Marking two decades of deﬁning the future of ﬂight, the biennial event will once again bring together global industry leaders, government and military delegations, innovators and investors to exchange ideas, forge partnerships and chart the next era of aerospace and defence.

headline: American Airlines starts flying the longest-range narrow-body Airbus plane. Here's what's inside
summary: The first Airbus A321XLR for a U.S. airline took off Thursday from John F. Kennedy International Airport in New York, bound for Los Angeles.
